data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of New Brunswick, Canada will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Brunswick, Canada
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of New Brunswick.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to New Brunswick, Canada.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 58,504 believers living in the state of New Brunswick. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jat (Muslim traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jat (Muslim traditions) people know you.
Jesus, please help the 58,504 believers in the state of New Brunswick to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 216,518, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 692,796 lost in New Brunswick that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
